A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Basically ignored everything you believed about Star Wars and was not consistent with episode 7. Also the main plot was the slowest and most boring chase scene ever. It had some good parts but was disappointing. 2-3 stars max. Will watch again but doubt It will warrant a higher score. This totally removed any hype I had for episode 9. I hope Disney and jj steer the last of the trilogy correctly to a proper fanfare.
